item.description:
Hi everyone,

I can't get there until 6, sorry just started a new job in MA, please ask for the  meetup FOR nANCY IN our own room. http://www.woodntap.com/menus/happy-tappy-hour/
Hope to see you there, reservations on meet up site a must.
Happy Hour
• 4 pm until 7 pm
6 Apps for $6 each (until 7pm)
1/2 Nacho
Bar Chicks
Fried Mooz
Calamari
Hummus Plate
Spinach Artichoke Dip

$4 Cocktails
Mojito
Red Sangria
Hard Lemonade
Flavored Margaritas
Malibu Red Margarita

$5 Wines
Chardonnay
Pinot Grigio
Pinot Noir
Merlot
Cabernet


$5 Martinis
Orange Cream Martini
Peach Passion Martini
Espresso Martini
Apple Martini

$3 Drafts
Coors Light
Blue Moon
Harpoon IPA
Summer Shandy
Saranac Blueberry
(Mirco Draft of the Week)
